com.magnet.web.core.spi

Interface WebContainer

  • All Superinterfaces:
    com.magnet.discovery.spi.NamespaceProvider
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    com.magnet.web.core.spi.impl.AbstractWebContainer, JettyService

    @Contract
public interface WebContainer
extends com.magnet.discovery.spi.NamespaceProvider
    An abstraction of a servlet/web container.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      String getBasePath()
      The base context path as a String.
      URI getBaseUri()
      The base URI to the server.
      int getPort()
      The port used by this container
      URI getPublicEndpoint()
      The base URI for the server that is publicly addressable.
      URI getResourceUri(String pageName)
      Returns the URI to the page name, or null if the page name is not known.
      List<String> getServletNames()
      The list of servlet names registered with this web container.
      List<Reference<javax.servlet.Servlet>> getServlets()
      The list of servlets registered with this WebContainer.

      • Methods inherited from interface com.magnet.discovery.spi.NamespaceProvider

        getNamespace, getPhysicalPaths, getServiceType, toLogicalPath, toPhysicalPath
